articles.content: Newcastle United are ready to turn to the Championship for the first signing of their new era, while Leeds United are now vying for a former Arsenal star – all according to Tuesday’s transfer gossip.… [+3454 chars]

articles.author: Lawrence Booth
articles.title: The Ashes: Jonny Bairstow misses out on a place in England squad for first Test against Australia - Daily Mail
articles.description: LAWRENCE BOOTH IN AUSTRALIA: Bairstow had been in contention for the final batting place in Joe Root's team, but failed twice during England's chaotic warm-up game over the weekend.
articles.content: England have omitted Jonny Bairstow from their 12-man squad for tonights first Ashes Test at Brisbane, and look set to choose between fast bowler Mark Wood and spinner Jack Leach before naming their … [+2586 chars]
